taskDescription:
The following reactivity order has been found for the saponification of alkyl acetates by aqueous NaOH. Explain.

CH3CO2CH3 > CH3CO2CH2CH3 > CH3CO2CH(CH3)2 > CH3CO2C(CH3)3
